dt2.10:1.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:1.2: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:2.5: manāyatanena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …pe…
dt2.10:2.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:3.4: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:3.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:4.4: maggasaccena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:4.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:5.5: purisindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:5.6: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:6.1: Manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:6.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:7.4: domanassindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:7.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:8.1: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:8.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:9.10: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:9.11: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:10.3: phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:10.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:11.3: kammabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:11.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:12.1: Rūpabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:12.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:13.3: paridevena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:13.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:14.16: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:14.17: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:15.6: manasikārena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:15.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:16.1: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:16.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:17.2: akusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:17.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:18.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:18.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:18.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:19.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:19.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:20.1: Vipākehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:20.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:21.2: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:21.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:22.2: anupādinnupādāniyehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:22.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:23.2: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:23.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:24.1: Savitakkasavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:24.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:25.2: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:25.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:26.1: Avitakkaavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:26.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.10:27.1: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:27.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:28.1: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:28.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:29.9: mahaggatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:29.10: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:30.2: paṇītehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:30.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. –12
dt2.10:31.1: Parittārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:31.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:32.8: maggādhipatīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:32.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:33.1: Anuppannehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:33.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:34.2: anāgatārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:34.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:35.4: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:35.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:36.2: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:36.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:37.4: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.5: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.6: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.7: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.8: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:37.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:38.5: rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:38.6: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:39.1: Lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:39.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:40.3: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:40.4: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:40.5: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:40.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:41.2: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:41.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:42.8: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:42.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:43.2: parāmāsavippayuttehi aparāmaṭṭhehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:43.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:44.8: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:44.9: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:45.4: upādādhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:45.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:46.1: Anupādinnehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:46.2: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:47.5: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.6: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.7: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.8: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.9: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:47.10: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:48.2: kilesavippayuttehi asaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:48.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:49.4: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:49.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:50.2: savicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:50.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:51.2: avicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:51.3: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.10:52.2: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:52.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:53.1: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:53.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:54.1: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:54.2: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:55.3: anuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:55.4: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:56.5: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:56.6: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
